description:
What does Tama do all day while the other cats and dogs are working? Gon has a one One Dog Show where he can never get bored. And Kuro patrols Third Street to protect the peace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tama no Oshigoto / Wagahai wa Gon de Aru / Inu no Omawari-san / Inu no Omawari-san 2
Tama`s Job / My Name Is Gon / Dog Police / Dog Police 2
タマのお仕事 / 我輩はゴンである / 犬のおまわりさん / 犬のおまわりさん2
